mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (member_id, movie_id, review_rating, review_content, review_select, review_like, review_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{movieId}, #{reviewRating}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewSelect}, #{reviewLike}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_content = #{reviewContent}, review_rating = #{reviewRating}, review_select = #{reviewSelect}, review_like = #{reviewLike}, review_date = NOW() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} ORDER BY review_date DESC
